Gem exchange

By Darthgali on Tuesday, April 25, 2006 - 02:57 pm:

Anyone know where you get the Sunshine and Moon Gems? I've got a bunch of the other 4 or 5 types, but don't have any of those 2.

By Tjmax on Tuesday, April 25, 2006 - 04:28 pm:

Try the harder dungeons i got a couple in the Marche Ruins and a few in the caves in Tochika

By kilak on Wednesday, April 26, 2006 - 01:57 pm:

sunshine I find mostly in the nameless corridor
also I think monster breed may effect this

By peter_poiuyt on Monday, June 5, 2006 - 02:38 pm:

By kilak on Tuesday, June 6, 2006 - 01:29 pm:

tongue bol far left side of the shop area (with saucer shop and item shop)
